Research Analyst Intern

Duration

6 months (Chance to become permanent based on performance}

Future Scope & Opportunities

Al is revolutionizing industries, and community-building is at the heart of Al adoption and innovation.
This internship provides hands-on experience in Research Frameworks, Market Analysis , Hands on
experience on Data visualization tools , Data Modelling , Research gates , Google scholar , Endnote,
Survey Methodology, Design Thinking .

With the skills and experience gained, you can explore future roles such as Product Manager , Senior
Research Analyst , Market Analysis.
